lines.text: [first lines]
This is the richest paydirt I ever found, Rinty, and you're going to have the best feed in your life - and a new gold collar.

[to Bob]
Please don't shoot and don't let them get me!
[after reading the tag on Rinty's collar]
L.M... Larry Moore! Do you know Larry? Boy, do you know Larry?
[Rinty barks excitedly]
You do?
[Rinty barks again]
Come on, take me to Larry!
I'll take care of the brain work, you just follow my orders.
[Slug points to Rinty who's looking out a hotel room window]
A dog... well, what of it?
That dog belongs to the fellow that calls himself Bob Crandall and that room belongs to the girl that's workin' for you. I got a hunch that them two's workin' together.
I'm beginning to understand what happened to that record book.
Then you murdered me father!
Removed might be a better word.
Well, what happened to you?
I don't know. I must be screwy or seein' things, but I just saw a worm turn into a wolf!
[Sheridan uses Molly as a human shield to affect his getaway]
Isn't that a cowardly trick!
[last lines]
You know, it looks as if we have a lot of work ahead of us.
Yeah. You know what I think?
What?
If we consolidated, it'd make it a lot easier.
That's a good idea.
Do you think so?
I second the motion.
